price: Whoever takes Allah, His Messenger, and the believers as their allies, then it is the party of Allah that will certainly prevail.
arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فَإِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
